message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. I believe it could greatly benefit you in your personal or professional endeavors. For this unique opportunity, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $125. I look forward to your response.
Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm interested, but $125 is a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $80 for the product? I'm confident it's a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your interest. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product. This price reflects its true value while remaining competitive. I hope this aligns better with your financial situation. Please let me know if you're able to accept this offer.
Alice,  $100 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $90, but I can't go any higher. If you're open to that, we can finalize the deal.
